title: Hansel and Gretel
short_plot_summary: A brother and sister named Hansel and Gretel are left in the woods by their parents. They follow a trail of breadcrumbs and discover a house made of sweets, only to be captured by a witch.
explanation: A pair of children, representing Hansel and Gretel, the siblings and main characters of the story
A loaf of bread, symbolizing the trail of breadcrumbs the children use to find their way back home
A lollipop, indicating the many sweets used to build the witch's house
A house, representing the witch's house made of sweets where Hansel and Gretel become trapped
A witch, signifying the antagonist who captures Hansel and Gretel in her candy house
